name: h3
description: The 2025 Victus Vibe Yellow Crayon Drop 10 JBB Baseball Bat is designed for young athletes aged 5-7, making it perfect for coach pitch games. This USSSA 1.15 BPF certified bat features a mid-balanced swing feel, enhancing control and power for budding players. Its one-piece alloy construction and 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, combined with the innovative VXP Alloy, delivers increased pop and extended durability. The ringless barrel construction ensures a thinner, more flexible sweet spot, while the micro-perforated soft-touch grip provides improved feel and control. With its striking yellow and black colorway, this bat is both visually appealing and performance-driven. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
